title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry bacon until crisp; remove from heat.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan and pepper.
Toss hot pasta with bacon, then quickly mix in egg-cheese off-heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken pieces in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt + spices (30 min+).
Grill or pan-sear chicken until charred; set aside.
Stir in cream and chicken; simmer 5–10 min.

title: Ghanaian Jollof Rice
summary: Smoky tomato rice cooked with spices and veggies.
steps: Add tomato purée; cook until reduced.
Add rice and stock; simmer covered.
Steam until rice is tender and smoky.
